casebody.data:
TILLMAN
v.
COMMERCIAL CREDIT. No. 360A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 31, 2006. G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Tillman and Richardson. Jeffrey M. Young, Research Triangle Park, Christopher J. Willis, Richard H. Sinkfield, Atlanta, GA, for Commercial Credit, et al.

The following order has been entered on the consent motion filed on the 27th day of July 2006 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (Tillman and Richardson) shall have up to and including the 14th day of September 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 31st day of July 2006."
